entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Calgary (Olympic Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:39 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Canada Olympic Park 09:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -6.4°C
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
